## Text File

```{r Project.txt}

project <- read.table("Project_OD_MF.txt",sep='\n',stringsAsFactors = FALSE)%>%
  separate(V1,c('variable','value'),':')

project$binary <- ifelse(unlist(lapply(project$variable,function(x) any(x==c(0:10))))==TRUE,NA,project$variable)%>%
  na.locf()

```
